001package reciprocal.linear.vector;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.math.MathContext;
008import java.util.List;
009import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
010
011/**
012 * Base class for vectors with {@link MathContext}
013 *
014 * @param <E> element
015 * @param <V> vector
016 * @param <N> norm
017 * @since 0.0.1
018 */
019public abstract class AbstractMathContextVector<E extends Number, V extends AbstractMathContextVector<E, V, N>, N extends Number>
020    extends AbstractVector<E, V, N> {
021    @Serial
022    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
023
024    /**
025     * Constructor
026     *
027     * @param size size
028     * @param vectorEntries entries
029     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code size < 1}
030     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code entries == null}
031     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when one element in entries is null
032     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code index < 1 || size < index} for one index
033     * @since 0.0.1
034     */
035    protected AbstractMathContextVector(final int size,
036        final @NotNull List<@NotNull VectorEntry<@NotNull E>> vectorEntries) {
037        super(size, vectorEntries);
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * Calculates the sum of this and the summand
042     *
043     * @param summand summand
044     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
045     * @return sum
046     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code summand == null}
047     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when sizes are unequal
048     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
049     * @since 0.0.1
050     */
051    public abstract V add(@NotNull V summand, @NotNull MathContext mathContext);
052
053    /**
054     * Calculates the difference of this and the subtrahend
055     *
056     * @param subtrahend subtrahend
057     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
058     * @return difference
059     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code summand == null}
060     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when sizes are unequal
061     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
062     * @since 0.0.1
063     */
064    public abstract V subtract(@NotNull V subtrahend, @NotNull MathContext mathContext);
065
066    /**
067     * Calculates the dot product of this and other
068     *
069     * @param other other
070     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
071     * @return dot product
072     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code other == null}
073     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when sizes are unequal
074     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
075     * @since 0.0.1
076     */
077    public abstract E dotProduct(@NotNull V other, @NotNull MathContext mathContext);
078
079    /**
080     * Calculates the scalar product pof this and the scalar
081     *
082     * @param scalar scalar
083     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
084     * @return scalar product
085     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code scalar == null}
086     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
087     * @since 0.0.1
088     */
089    public abstract @NotNull V scalarMultiply(@NotNull E scalar, @NotNull MathContext mathContext);
090
091    /**
092     * Calculates the negated vector of this
093     *
094     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
095     * @return negated vector
096     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
097     * @since 0.0.1
098     */
099    public abstract @NotNull V negate(@NotNull MathContext mathContext);
100
101    /**
102     * Calculates if this is orthogonal to other
103     *
104     * @param other other
105     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
106     * @return {@link Boolean}
107     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code other == null}
108     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when sizes are unequal
109     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
110     * @since 0.0.1
111     */
112    public abstract boolean orthogonalTo(@NotNull V other, @NotNull MathContext mathContext);
113
114    /**
115     * Calculates the taxicab norm
116     *
117     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
118     * @return taxicab norm
119     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
120     * @since 0.0.1
121     */
122    public abstract @NotNull N taxicabNorm(@NotNull MathContext mathContext);
123
124    /**
125     * Calculates the euclidean norm
126     *
127     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
128     * @return euclidean norm
129     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
130     * @since 0.0.1
131     */
132    public abstract @NotNull N euclideanNorm(@NotNull MathContext mathContext);
133
134    /**
135     * Calculates the maximum norm
136     *
137     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
138     * @return max norm
139     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
140     * @since 0.0.1
141     */
142    public abstract @NotNull N maxNorm(@NotNull MathContext mathContext);
143
144    /**
145     * Calculates the taxicab distance to other
146     *
147     * @param other other
148     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
149     * @return taxicab distance
150     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code other == null}
151     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when sizes are unequal
152     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
153     * @since 0.0.1
154     */
155    public final @NotNull N taxicabDistance(final @NotNull V other, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
156        requireNonNull(other, "other");
157        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
158        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
159        return subtract(other, mathContext).taxicabNorm(mathContext);
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * Calculates the euclidean distance to other
164     *
165     * @param other other
166     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
167     * @return euclidean distance
168     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code other == null}
169     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if sizes are unequal
170     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
171     * @since 0.0.1
172     */
173    public final @NotNull N euclideanDistance(final @NotNull V other, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
174        requireNonNull(other, "other");
175        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
176        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
177        return subtract(other, mathContext).euclideanNorm(mathContext);
178    }
179
180    /**
181     * Calculates the maximum distance to other
182     *
183     * @param other other
184     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
185     * @return max distance
186     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code other == null}
187     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if sizes are unequal
188     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
189     * @since 0.0.1
190     */
191    public final @NotNull N maxDistance(final @NotNull V other, final @NotNull MathContext mathContext) {
192        requireNonNull(other, "other");
193        checkArgument(getSize() == other.getSize(), "equal sizes expected but %s != %s", getSize(), other.getSize());
194        requireNonNull(mathContext, "mathContext");
195        return subtract(other, mathContext).maxNorm(mathContext);
196    }
197
198    /**
199     * Calculates the square of the euclidean norm
200     *
201     * @param mathContext {@link MathContext}
202     * @return square of the euclidean norm
203     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code mathContext == null}
204     * @since 0.0.1
205     */
206    protected abstract @NotNull N euclideanNormPow2(@NotNull MathContext mathContext);
207}
